bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:30 AM. Recess is from 10 to 10:20. For grade 1 and 3 recess is from  10 to 10:20 and lunch is from 11:45 to 12:30.  For second, 4th and 5th graders, recess is from 10:20 to 10:40 and lunch is from 12:30 to 1:15. For Kindergarden to 3 rd grade - school is dismissed at 2:35. For 4th and 5th graders - school dismissed at 3:05 PM
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early release day. School starts at 9 AM. All grades are dismissed at 2 PM
